+++++ [https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7059617006345096494?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en Process Video] | [http://www.example.com SCP-507] | [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/day-trip Day Trip(Second is bottom of Day Trip)]

[[<]]
> **Filename:** 507.mp4, 507.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7059617006345096494?is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1&lang=en
> **Derivative of:** SCP-507 by Anonymous, A Spin Around The Library by Dr Whitney.
[[/<]]
-----
Managed to squeeze a tale I really like into a video TikTok wanted me to make!

I really liked this story because I mean... I love friendly monsterlike characters, the Wanderer's Library, anomalies escaping from Foundation custody, and looking at pictures. It's all a win! I didn't even KNOW you could do tales that were comics before I saw Whitney's stuff and have been wanting to draw something from one of them for a while now. Ended up doing TWO technically.

I know the signs weren't supposed to be light up but I... felt like the piece needed more movement. I think it turned out very well!

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
